scripts.build: nx build service && nx build nxcontainer
scripts.test: npm run test:service && npm run test:nxcontainer
scripts.build:images: npm run build && docker build -t experiment-service -f apps/service/Dockerfile . && docker build -t experiment-nxcontainer -f apps/nxcontainer/Dockerfile .
scripts.images:start: docker run -p 3001:3001 --name experiment-service -d experiment-service && docker run -p 3000:3000 --name experiment-nxcontainer -d experiment-nxcontainer
scripts.images:stop: docker stop experiment-service && docker stop experiment-nxcontainer
scripts.compose:up: npm run build && docker compose up --build
